#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define gc getchar
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,i,j;
    char voter[105][25];
    int vote[110];
    t=read_int();
    while(t--)
    {
        n=read_int();
        ll score=0,a[n];
        char ch;
        memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>voter[i]>>ch;
            if(ch=='+')
                vote[i]=1;
            else
                vote[i]=-1;
        }
        ll v;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]!=1)
            {
                for(j=i;j<n;j++)
                {
                    if(strcmp(voter[i],voter[j])==0)
                    {
                        v=vote[j];
                        a[j]=1;
                    }
                }
                score+=v;
            }
        }
        cout<<score<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
